devdoc.details: This is the implementation of the ERC20 nWork Token. The implementation exposes a Permit() function to allow for a spender to send a signed message and approve funds to a spender following EIP2612 to make integration with other contracts easier. EIP2612 describes how to use EIP712 for the Permit() function.

params._account: The address of the account holding the funds
params._spender: The address of the account spending the funds

approve(address,uint256).details: This will overwrite the approval amount for `spender`  and is subject to issues noted [here](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-20#approve)

params._amount: The number of tokens that are approved (2^256-1 means infinite)
params._spender: The address of the account which may transfer tokens

returns._0: Whether or not the approval succeeded

params._account: The address of the account to get the balance of
Developer account to initially mint tokens
params._initialSupplyDev: Amount to give to the dev account
params._initialSupplyMinter: Amount to give to the Treasury
params._mintingAllowedAfter: The timestamp after which minting may occur

params._delegatee: The address to delegate votes to

getPriorVotes(address,uint256).details: Block number must be a finalized block or else this function will revert to prevent misinformation.

params._account: The address of the account to check
params._blockNumber: The block number to get the vote balance at

returns._0: The number of votes the account had as of the given block

params._amount: The number of tokens to be minted
params._dst: The address of the destination accoutn

permit(address,address,uint256,uint256,u.details: Approve token allowance by validating a message signed by the holder.

params._deadline: Expiration time of the signed permit
params._value: Amount of tokens to approve the spender

params._minter: The address of the new minter

params._amount: The number of tokens to transfer
params._dst: The address of the destination account

returns._0: Whether or not the transfer succeeded

params._amount: The number of tokens to transfer
params._dst: The address of the destination account
params._src: The address of the source account

returns._0: Whether or not the transfer succeeded

devdoc.title: nWorkToken contract

DELEGATION_TYPEHASH().notice: The EIP-712 typehash for the delegation struct used by the contract

PERMIT_TYPEHASH().notice: The EIP-712 typehash for the permit struct used by the contract

allowance(address,address).notice: Get the number of tokens `spender` is approved to spend on behalf of `account`

approve(address,uint256).notice: Approve `spender` to transfer up to `amount` from `src`

balanceOf(address).notice: Get the number of tokens held by the `account`

getPriorVotes(address,uint256).notice: Determine the prior number of votes for an account as of a block number. Counts the delegated votes as voting power.
